title: Disconnection Alert
summary: Alert on both phone and wear when whey're disconnected.
description: Play Sound on the phone and vibrate on the wear when they are disconnected. It helps a lot to avoid leaving either your phone or wear behind.
descriptionHTML: Play Sound on the phone and vibrate on the wear when they are disconnected. It helps a lot to avoid leaving either your phone or wear behind.
comments: I installed the app just to rate it Don't bother. There are much better alternatives on the Play Store.
Too loud The vibration is fine but i don't need an ear spltting siren. Why no myte option?
Not good. This alarm went off while I was on a plane taxing out to take off and I almost got kicked off. Perhaps a more subtle tone?
